companyInfo.description: At PropiConnect, we offer the comprehensive Inmoshare platform for property management. Our mission is to simplify the buying, selling, and renting of properties, providing efficient tools for owners, tenants, and investors. Whether you want to rent or sell your property, manage payments and contracts, or participate in shared property ownership, we're here to help. Discover how our technology can transform the way you manage your properties and maximize your income.

description.d1: List properties for rent or sale.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team is made up of UPC software engineers who stand out for their intelligence and dedication. We strive to ensure that our users are completely satisfied with our services. With a focus on innovation and efficiency, we work daily to provide technological solutions that exceed expectations and deliver an exceptional property management experience.

reviews.user1: Excellent service! I was able to rent out my property quickly and manage all payments through the platform.
reviews.user2: I love how easy it is to find properties, and the shared ownership option is great.
reviews.user3: The best platform to manage my properties, I even get valuation reports.
reviews.user4: The Pro plan allowed me to join others to buy a property. Now I'm a homeowner!
reviews.user5: The support and management features are top-notch. Totally recommended.

description.d1: Allows you to publish and view properties.
